fullText: [1] The American Theological Library Association and Hugoye: Journal of Syriac Studies are pleased to announce ATLAS, the first major digital journal project created for religion scholars by religion scholars.Â  The ATLAS collection includes many of the leading journals from all areas of theology and religion, including Hugoye .
title: ATLAS Digital Journal Project
Hugoye: Journal of Syriac Studies
author: Association, American
